package.name: kuka_kr270_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA KR 270 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR 270 manipulators. This currently includes the R2700 only.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in KUKA KR 270 R2700 ultra , version version 0000-181-028 / V46.1 / 07.01.2021. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
